text_font_size=”1rem” text_line_height=”1.5rem” header_2_font=”|700|||||||” header_2_text_color=”#000000″ header_2_font_size=”1.8rem” header_2_letter_spacing=”2px” custom_margin=”||30px||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”||30px||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Research is at the core of Indo Farm. We inspire & encourage our teams to keep inventing & innovating. Our dedicated researchers & engineers are constantly breaking barriers & bringing new technology. We use automation tools like AutoCAD & ProE to enable us to design and virtually simulate the components and processes.

This approach allows us to be indigenous & that’s why

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”_initial” text_font_size=”1rem” text_line_height=”1.5rem” header_font_size=”26px” header_2_font=”|700|||||||” header_2_text_color=”#000000″ header_2_font_size=”1.4rem” header_2_letter_spacing=”2px” custom_margin=”||4px||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”||30px||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” global_colors_info=”{}”]

SOME KEY ACHIEVEMENTS

  • Indigenisation of technology for manufacture of high-grade tractor engines
  • Development of indigenous engines in 3-cylinder and 4-cylinder range, used in our 3 series tractor models
  • Design of re-entrant type combustion chamber in all engines for better combustion through proper air fuel mixing resulting in low fuel consumption
  • Ring-carrier design in 3 series engines for increased piston life
  • Engines having sufficient back-up torque for deep cultivation and haulage of heavy loads on steep gradients
  • Diesel filter-cum-water separator for removal of water from diesel for enhanced life of Fuel Injection Pump
  • Pick-N-Carry cranes of 9 tonnes-30 tonnes capacity
  • Engines for Genset Applications from 15 kVa to 50 kVA
  • Diesel Gensets of 15 kVA to 50 kVA
  • Harvester Combine

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_button button_url=”/contact-us/” button_text=”Contact Us” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#000000″ button_bg_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” button_border_color=”#bcbcbc” button_font=”|||on|||||” button_icon=”||divi||400″ button_icon_placement=”left” button_on_hover=”off” custom_padding=”|65px||85px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_bg_color__hover=”#FCAF17″ button_bg_enable_color__hover=”on” button_border_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_border_color__hover=”#FCAF17″][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
